Title: Directs the commissioner of education to establish a system for grading for-profit institutions of higher education
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education to establish a database of information on for-profit institutions of higher education and a system for grading such institutions; requires for-profit institutions of higher education to prominently display on its website the letter grade most recently assigned.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to directing the commissioner of education to establish a system for grading for-profit institutions of higher education
